name: gofannon-webapp-monorepo
description: Monorepo for the Gofannon Web Application.

scripts.test: pnpm run test:unit && pnpm run test:integration
scripts.test:unit: pnpm run test:unit:frontend && pnpm run test:unit:backend
scripts.test:integration: pnpm run test:integration:backend && pnpm run test:e2e
scripts.test:coverage: pnpm run test:coverage:frontend && pnpm run test:coverage:backend
